Package net.minestom.server.data

Class DataType<T>

java.lang.Object
net.minestom.server.data.DataType<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of the object
Direct Known Subclasses:
BooleanArrayData, BooleanData, ByteArrayData, ByteData, CharacterArrayData, CharacterData, DoubleArrayData, DoubleData, FloatArrayData, FloatData, IntegerArrayData, IntegerData, InventoryData, ItemStackArrayData, ItemStackData, LongArrayData, LongData, SerializableDataData, ShortArrayData, ShortData, StringArrayData, StringData, UuidType
@Deprecated public abstract class DataType<T> extends Object
Deprecated.
Represents an object which can be encoded and decoded back.

Used by DataManager for SerializableDataImpl and by the storage API in StorageLocation.

  • Method Details

    • encode

      public abstract void encode(@NotNull @NotNull BinaryWriter writer, @NotNull T value)
      Deprecated.
      Encodes the data type.

      Be sure that the encoded value can be decoded back using decode(BinaryReader).

      Parameters:
      writer - the data writer
      value - the value to encode
